=== Current Issues ===
==== SD/MMC Card Reader ====
Doesn't work, encoutered system freeze after inserting card. lspci output:
<pre>
06:04.0 CardBus bridge: ENE Technology Inc CB-712/4 Cardbus Controller (rev 10)
06:04.1 FLASH memory: ENE Technology Inc ENE PCI Memory Stick Card Reader Controller (rev 01)
06:04.2 Class 0805: ENE Technology Inc ENE PCI Secure Digital Card Reader Controller (rev 01)
06:04.3 FLASH memory: ENE Technology Inc FLASH memory: ENE Technology Inc: (rev 01)
06:04.4 FLASH memory: ENE Technology Inc Unknown device 0551 (rev 01)
</pre>
==== Integrated webcam ====
Doesn't work, lsusb gives:
<pre>
Bus 005 Device 003: ID 0402:5602 ALi Corp.
</pre>

=== Notes ===
==== Screen ====
Widescreen resolution 1280x800 not recognized properly out of the box, fixed after installing 915resolution.
==== Wireless NIC ====
See http://forum.ubuntu.pl/viewtopic.php?t=8424 for BCM4318 [AirForce One 54g] 802.11g Wireless LAN Controller installation instructions.
